title: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia
fullTitle: It's Always Sunny in Philadelphia (TV Series 2005â€“ )

episodes.title: Mac and Dennis: Manhunters
episodes.plot: Mac and Dennis pursue the ultimate high of hunting another man by stalking Rickety Cricket, while Dee and Charlie become obsessed with eating human flesh after they come to believe Frank has fed some of it to them.

episodes.title: The Gang Solves the Gas Crisis
episodes.plot: While Mac, Dennis, and Charlie use their classic setup to sell gallons of gasoline door to door, Frank subjects Dee to a series of torture and mind games when he suspects that Dee is trying to kill him while the two plot to steal their inheritance from Bruce Mathis.

episodes.title: America's Next Top Paddy's Billboard Model Contest
episodes.plot: After buying a billboard, Frank subjects Dennis to a series of humiliating tests in a competition to get on the billboard, while Mac tries to find female subjects willing to go through his own version of a reality show, of sorts.

episodes.title: Mac's Banging the Waitress
episodes.plot: Charlie manipulates Mac and Dennis when he accuses the two of them with sleeping with the coffee shop waitress.

episodes.title: Mac & Charlie Die: Part 1
episodes.plot: After Mac's father is released from prison, Mac and Charlie stage their own deaths to save their lives.

episodes.title: Mac & Charlie Die: Part 2
episodes.plot: After Mac and Charlie fake their own deaths, the rest of the gang finds unique ways of dealing with the loss.

episodes.title: Who Pooped the Bed?
episodes.plot: Frank and Charlie find someone has pooped in their bed, leading Mac and Dennis to join them as they attempt to find the culprit.

episodes.title: Paddy's Pub: The Worst Bar in Philadelphia
episodes.plot: The gang kidnaps the writer of a review claiming that Paddy's is the worst bar in Philadelphia and tries to force him to change his mind. But things get worse when Dennis and Dee accidentally kidnap the writer's neighbor.

episodes.title: Dennis Reynolds: An Erotic Life
episodes.plot: While Frank and Mac come up with ways to spice up Dennis' erotic memoir, Dee finds that spending time in Charlie's shoes is way more difficult than it seems, and vice-versa.

episodes.title: Sweet Dee Has a Heart Attack
episodes.plot: After Dee suffers a heart attack, she and Dennis try a healthier lifestyle. Charlie and Mac join the corporate work force to get health insurance.

episodes.title: The Gang Cracks the Liberty Bell
episodes.plot: In order to get Paddy's recognized by the city as a historical landmark, Mac, Dennis, and Charlie flash back to 1776 to tell the tale of the Paddy's crew's involvement in the cracking of the Liberty Bell.

episodes.title: The Gang Gets Extreme: Home Makeover Edition
episodes.plot: While trying to make their own dreams come true, the gang decides to pay it forward to an unlucky family living in the city only to have their plans backfire on them.

episodes.title: The Nightman Cometh
episodes.plot: Charlie stages a rock opera based on his song "Nightman," and recruits the rest of the gang to help him with it.
